sequence:
The Lucky Crane

<size=45>Chapter 6 - Someone Like Me...</size>

scripts.say: Geesh... There's an unusual amount of paperwork today... Usually, by now you'd have already been gone to sleep...
It's been a long time since I've had to work this late into the night.
Um, since it's so late, maybe I should make you something light to eat?
Don't you know, Zuikaku? You should have something prepared before you even ask that.
I noticed that you hadn't come back to the dorm yet, so I reasoned that you must still be hard at work...
It's not good for your health to overwork yourself. Now, watch and learn the importance of being prepared...
With an alluring smile, Shoukaku reached into her pockets and took out a handful of snacks and a small can, which she placed on my desk.
B-but I was just about to prepare something... Wait a minute, is that... beer?
It is~ The Commander has been working all day, so I thought a drink might help relieve some of the stress... In a way, I'm also taking a little revenge for that thing a few days ago~
By which I mean that time when I'd had a lot to drink, and... Oh, you haven't told her yet, have you, Commander...?
I don't remember anything like that...
(I knew it: sis has been doing all sorts of stuff with the Commander when I'm not around...)
(I get it now... She's prettier than me, she's more composed than me, and though we're equals in combat, she's a way better secretary than me... Someone like me can't even hold a candle to her...)
... Alright, then... I'll just go and leave my snacks in the fridge...
... Maybe I took my teasing a little too far?
